message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even at a premium price. To start our negotiation, I'm offering it to you for $1,800,000.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am not able to meet the price of $1,800,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,500,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your position, but my initial offer reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,700,000.  This is a very fair price considering the potential returns you'll see.
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. However, I still feel that $1,700,000 is too high for me. I am prepared to pay no more than $1,600,000 for the product.
